graphql.query:
query ($fullName : String
       $phoneNumber : String
       $createdAt : Date 
       $paymentType : String){
    customers(  fullName: $fullName
                phoneNumber : $phoneNumber
                createdAt : $createdAt
                paymentType : $paymentType) {
                                              id
                                              fullName 
                                              phoneNumber
                                              address
                                              createdAt
                                              purchaseTransactions {
                                                                    id 
                                                                    paymentType
                                                                    amount 
                                                                    createdAt
                                                                    }

                                                    }
}
